IR.WeaponTagAgileDescription: Can attack before or after taking a normal Boost action.
IR.WeaponTagAnchorDescription: On a Weak Hit or or better, gain X Inertia until the start of your next turn.
IR.WeaponTagBurstDescription: Also hits all foes Matched to its targets.
IR.WeaponTagCooldownDescription: Can't make attacks two rounds in a row.
IR.WeaponTagFractureDescription: On a Strong Hit, Fractures targets until the start of your next turn.
IR.WeaponTagDecelDescription: On a Strong Hit, forces targets to lose up to X Speed (you can choose less, but not zero).
IR.WeaponTagDisruptDescription: On a Strong Hit, Disrupts targets until the start of your next turn.
IR.WeaponTagLeechDescription: On destroying a non-Chaff foe, clears 1 Drive Stress.
IR.WeaponTagLockDescription: On a Strong Hit, Locks targets until the start of your next turn.
IR.WeaponTagOverwhelmDescription: When attacking, foes can only activate on Nulls, not Weak Hits.
IR.WeaponTagParryDescription: 1/round when you'd take Impact, roll a d6. On a 6, ignore negative effects and reflect it back to its source as Harm.
IR.WeaponTagPierceDescription: Harm dealt can't be reduced in any way. (Immunity still applies).
IR.WeaponTagPrimeDescription: On a Strong Hit, Primes targets until the start of your next turn.
IR.WeaponTagSlowingDescription: On a Strong Hit, Slows targets until the start of your next turn.
IR.WeaponTagStunDescription: On a Strong Hit, Stuns targets until the start of your next turn.
IR.WeaponTagTaxingDescription: Can't attack if you've Boosted at all this turn. Once you've attacked, you can't Boost until the start of your next turn.
IR.WeaponTagWeakenDescription: On a Strong Hit, Weakens targets until the start of your next turn.
SETTINGS.SimpleMacroShorthandL: Enable a shortened macro syntax which allows referencing attributes directly, for example @str instead of @attributes.str.value. Disable this setting if you need the ability to reference the full attribute model, for example @attributes.str.label.
SETTINGS.SimpleInitFormulaL: Enter an initiative formula, such as d20+@dex
SIMPLE.NotifyGroupAttrDuplicate: Attribute group already exists as an attribute.
SIMPLE.NotifyGroupAlphanumeric: Attribute group names may not contain spaces or periods.
SIMPLE.NotifyGroupReserved: Attribute group "{key}" is reserved and cannot be used.
SIMPLE.NotifyAttrDuplicate: Attribute key already exists as a group.
SIMPLE.DeleteGroupContent: Do you wish to delete this group? This will delete the following group and all attributes included in it:
